string.text: Failed to connect to that game. It may no longer exist.
Failed to join that game. It may already be full.
The network cable is not connected. Please check your network cables and try again.
This Your Network Configuration file was created on another console and cannot be used.
This Your Network Configuration is corrupt and cannot be used.
Please select a network configuration before playing online.
Could not connect. Please check your network hardware and cables to ensure they are connected properly.

Online play is no longer available since the online servers have been shut down permanently.

You can use Parsec to simulate an online game with friends. Instructions for using Parsec with Ultimate Alliance can be found in the readme folder of the OCP.

Another method of playing with friends is by simulating a LAN game using Hamachi. Beware, this method is not most recommended as it can cause issues or delay in game.
Online play is no longer available.
The Character List is currently in use by another player.
The Equipment Screen is currently in use by another player.
The network cable is not connected. Please check your network cables and try again.
Could not authenticate user ID and password. Please check your network configuration and try again.
Leaving the game now will end this session. Are you sure you want to leave?
Your Xbox console cannot connect to Xbox Live. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to start the troubleshooter or $MENU_BACK to cancel.
A required update is available for the Xbox Live service. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to update or $MENU_BACK to cancel. You cannot connect to Xbox Live until the update is installed.
This account is not current. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to update the account in Account Recovery or $MENU_BACK to cancel.
The Xbox Live service is busy. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to try again or $MENU_BACK to cancel.
You have an important message from Xbox Live. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to read the message.
You have a new Xbox Live message. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to read now or $MENU_BACK to read later.
Select Maximum Number of Player Slots
You must have at least two players to start the game.
Could not automatically detect network settings. Check connections and DHCP server or choose a different network configuration.
There was an error in the response from the DNS server. Please check your network configuration file.
Would you like to send a voice message to %s?
Not Signed In: Pass Code Needed
You were signed out of Xbox Live because another person signed on using your account. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to continue.
Would you like to attach a voice message?
The game does not have enough openings for all the players on your console. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to continue.
This game session is no longer available.
Your current game will end without saving. All unsaved progress will be lost. Are you sure you wish to accept the game invite?
Are you sure you want to remove %s from your Xbox Live Friends List? Any unread messages from %s will be lost.
Are you sure you would like to block all future Friend Requests from %s?
Your current game will end without saving. All unsaved progress will be lost. Are you sure you wish to join %s's game?
The text entered appears to contain offensive language and is not allowed. See the Xbox Live Code of Conduct for more information.
Only games that are saved when connected to Xbox Live can be used for online multiplayer campaign games

The game requires that all players use the same television standard, video mode, and resolution to play online together. This player is using a different television standard, video mode, or resolution. You are unable to join this game.
No matches found. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to Create Match, $MENU_BACK to Cancel.
This player is hosting a saved campaign game. You have been blocked from joining this game. To join saved campaign games you must enable Created Content in the Xbox Dashboard.
Games that are saved when not connected to Xbox Live can not be used in future Xbox Live game sessions.
Unable to add friend because your friends list is full.
The game does not have enough openings for all the players on your console.
Unable to add the specified friend because that player's friends list is full.
This player is already on your friends list.
Are you sure you want to leave positive feedback for
Are you sure you want to leave negative feedback for
You have lost communication with one of the other player(s).
Player(s) have been dropped from the game.
The host has dropped you from the game.
%s has been dropped from the game session.
Adding player %d to the game. Please wait...
Establishing connection to the host. Please wait...
You have momentarily lost communication with at least one of the other players....
This game session is no longer available. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to continue.
Not enough players remain to continue. Please press $MENU_ACCEPT to return to the main menu.
You have been removed from the game.
%s has been removed from the game
This game session is no longer available. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to continue.
The host has left the game.
Are you sure you want to remove %s from this game session?
The connection to your Internet service provider (ISP) cannot be established. Please check your network adaptor, cables, and/or your network configuration file and try again.
Press $MENU_ACCEPT to continue to play offline.
You have lost connection to the host.
Unable to join the game. Attempting to try again. Press $MENU_BACK to cancel.
Failed to join the game. Press $MENU_ACCEPT to try again. Press $MENU_BACK to cancel.
Unable to add player %d. Attempting to try again...
Failed to add player %s to the game.
This is an invalid network configuration and cannot be used.
Your network connection is no longer available
Please enter the pass code for %s.
All players must be ready before you can begin the game.
Your current game will end without saving. All unsaved progress will be lost. Are you sure you wish to quit your game and accept the game invite?

Your Network Configuration file was not found. Please insert a memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) with Your Network Configuration file into MEMORY CARD slot 1 or 2. To create, edit or delete Your Network Configuration Files please use the network adaptor start-up disc.
Do you want to continue to play the game in single-player mode? Selecting 'No' will return you to the Main Menu.
An Xbox Live membership limitation does not allow you to use this feature.
Could not access the external network device. Please check all connections and reconnect.
%s has a pending game invite. Would you like to sign in and continue connecting to this game?

Your Network Configuration file was not found. Please insert a memory card (8MB)(for PlayStation${R}2) with Your Network Configuration file into MEMORY CARD slot 1 or 2. To create, edit or delete Your Network Configuration Files please use the Network Access Disc.
